一次性消耗当前所有能量: Consumes all current energy at once...
并转化为同等伤害: ...and converts it into an equal amount of damage.
回合敌人不能使用: turns where the enemy cannot use
提高植物系宠物腐蚀的效果: Enhances the corrosion effect of Plant-type pets.
延长野兽系宠物撕裂的持续回合: Extends the duration of the Bleed effect for Beast-type pets.
提高金属系宠物的防御效果: Enhances the defensive capabilities of Metal-type pets.
飞行系宠物攻击时可以同时减少对手能量: Flying-type pets can reduce the opponent's energy while attacking.
海洋系宠物攻击时可以减少部分能量消耗: Ocean-type pets use less energy when attacking.
可与经验丰富同时使用: Can be stacked with the 'Experienced' trait.
可与经验多多同时使用: Can be stacked with the 'Lots of EXP' trait.
提高遇到稀有宠物的几率: Increases the encounter rate for rare pets.
捕获失败时敌人也不会逃跑: The enemy will not flee even if capture fails.
在任意地形战斗都变为更利于植物系宠物的花园地形: Transforms any battlefield into 'Garden' terrain, favoring Plant-type pets.
在任意地形战斗都变为更利于金属系宠物的遗迹地形: change any battlefield into 'Ruins' terrain for Metal pets.
在任意地形战斗都变为更利于飞行系宠物的天空地形: Transforms any battlefield into 'Sky' terrain, favoring Flying-type pets.
在任意地形战斗都变为更利于猛兽系宠物的平原地形: Transforms any battlefield into 'Plains' terrain, favoring Beast-type pets.
在任意地形战斗都变为更利于海洋系宠物的大海地形: Transforms any battlefield into 'Ocean' terrain, favoring Ocean-type pets.
的几率伤害减半: chance for damage to be halved.
复活死亡的宠物并为其回复生命值的: Revives a fallen pet and restores its HP.
短时间不会遇敌: Prevents encounters for a short time.
较长时间不会遇敌: Prevents encounters for a long time.
白金龙进化的必备材料: Essential material for Platinum Dragon evolution.
古树之王进化的必备材料: Essential material for Ancient Tree King evolution.
水晶雄狮进化的必备材料: Essential material for Crystal Great Lion evolution.
虎酋长进化的必备材料: Essential material for Tiger Chieftain evolution.
得到刀枪将军的必须材料: Required material to obtain Sword and Spear General.
里面放着未知物品的宝箱: A treasure chest containing an unknown item.
用钥匙才能打开宝箱: Use a key to open the treasure chest.
据说某些宠物持有该道具后就能异化成强大的形态: Legend says certain pets can mutate into powerful forms when holding this item.
掌握该技能后可以在战斗中治疗自己: Allows the pet to heal itself during battle.
掌握该技能的宠物可以在战斗中治疗自己: Pets with this skill can heal themselves in battle.
该技能可使敌人暂时不能使用: Prevents the enemy from using Lv.
提高植物系宠物腐蚀的威力: Increases the power of Plant-type corrosion.
飞行系宠物攻击时可同时减少对手能量: Flying-type pets can also reduce opponent's energy when attacking.
海洋系宠物攻击时可以减少能量消耗: Ocean-type pets can reduce energy consumption when attacking.
掌握该技能的宠物战斗后能获得双倍经验: Pets with this skill earn double EXP after battle.
掌握该技能的宠物战斗后能获得三倍经验: Pets with this skill earn triple EXP after battle.
携带掌握该技能的宠物移动时能提高遇到珍稀宠物的几率: Increases the chance of encountering rare pets while traveling with this pet.
掌握该技能后捕获失败时敌人不会逃跑: Enemies will not flee even if capture fails when this skill is active.
在任意地形战斗都变为更利于野兽系宠物的平原地形: Changes the terrain to Plains, favoring Beast-type pets.
在任意地形战斗都变为更利于海洋系宠物的海面地形: Changes the terrain to Ocean, favoring Ocean-type pets.
能孵化出植物系宠物的宠物蛋: A Pet Egg that hatches into a Plant-type pet.
能孵化出金属系宠物的宠物蛋: A Pet Egg that hatches into a Metal-type pet.
能孵化出天空系宠物的宠物蛋: A Pet Egg that hatches into a Flying-type pet.
能孵化出野兽系宠物的宠物蛋: A Pet Egg that hatches into a Beast-type pet.
能孵化出海洋系宠物的宠物蛋: A Pet Egg that hatches into an Ocean-type pet.
海洋系宠物蛋刃贵族区: Ocean-type Pet Egg Blade Noble Area
生命比同类要少: Has less HP than others of its kind.
生命比同类要多: Has more HP than others of its kind.
灼烧或腐蚀会对自己造成更多的伤害: Takes increased damage from Burn or Corrosion.
受攻击时更容易进入石化状态: More susceptible to Petrification when attacked.
受攻击时更容易进入禁锢状态: More susceptible to Binding when attacked.
攻击时有几率伤害骤减: Chance for damage to be significantly reduced when attacking.
攻击时有几率伤害暴增: Chance for damage to increase significantly when attacking.
受攻击时很容易进入撕裂和腐蚀状态: Susceptible to Bleed and Corrosion when attacked.
受攻击时几乎不会进入撕裂和腐蚀状态昂: Almost never enters torn and corroded states when attacked.
明可爱的小树怪: A smart and cute little tree monster.
崓全身充满致命毒液的树怪: Tree monster filled with deadly venom.
发怒时拥有毁灭一切的强大威力: Possesses the power to destroy everything when enraged.
崜利用五彩斑斓的外表吸引猎物: Uses its colorful appearance to attract prey.
崓已经化作人形的神奇果子: Magical fruit that has transformed into human form.
崙有着时髦爆炸头的神奇果子: Magical fruit with a fashionable afro.
崝盛开出美丽花朵的花仙: Flower fairy blooming with beautiful flowers.
植物系远景闻名的战士: Plant-type warrior famous for its long-range vision.
崒以周身的巨刺击退敌人: Repels enemies with giant thorns all over its body.
崚周身的毒刺有令敌人立即毙命的强大威力: The poisonous thorns all over its body have the powerful ability to instantly kill enemies.
崐喜爱跳舞的小姑娘: Little girl who loves to dance.
崑女王气质不凡的花仙: Flower fairy with extraordinary queenly demeanor.
崔覆盖着白金外壳的勇猛之狮: Brave lion covered in a platinum shell.
身上散发着无穷的霸气: Exudes an aura of absolute dominance.
撩人的气势已经让人无法靠近: An intimidating presence that keeps everyone at a distance.
金属系最强的存在: The strongest being of the Metal-type.
崔包裹着金属外皮的古怪宠物: Strange pet wrapped in metal skin.
崢华丽的金皮显示着王者的尊贵: Gorgeous golden skin shows the nobility of a king.
强劲的力量足以让对手臣服: Powerful enough to make any opponent submit.
崏蛇王难过蛇后关: Snake King finds it hard to pass the Snake Queen's test.
崓手握长枪冲锋在前的将军: General charging forward with a spear in hand.
崐铁头的哥哥叫巨人: Iron Head's brother is named Giant.
崑周身充满磁性的宠物: Pet full of magnetism around its body.
崓无辜的眼神难掩恶魔本质: Innocent eyes cannot hide its demonic nature.
拥有神的实力: Possesses the power of a god.
崓在天空中翱翔的凶猛鸟类: Ferocious bird soaring in the sky.
振翅间即可飞到九霄天外: Can fly beyond the heavens in a single flap.
崔神秘的披风让人想一探究竟: Mysterious cloak makes people want to find out more.
让人忍不住想抱抱: Makes people want to hug it.
崖有着可爱棉花糖耳朵的前卫小鸟: Avant-garde bird with cute cotton candy ears.
崑虎族中最优秀的战士: The best warrior in the Tiger Clan.
崒虎族中骁勇善战的勇者: Brave and skilled warrior in the Tiger Clan.
虎族的强大首领: The mighty leader of the Tiger Clan.
崑爱吃爱睡的鼻涕小猪: Snotty piglet that loves to eat and sleep.
崑野猪界的黑社会头头: Boss of the wild boar underworld.
崓容易被错认为小猫的豹子: Leopard easily mistaken for a kitten.
崔牙齿爪子十分锋利的暗影者: Shadow creature with extremely sharp teeth and claws.
崔喜欢水中嬉戏的顽皮小鲸鱼: Naughty little whale that loves to play in the water.
崒喜欢恶作剧的可爱海龟: Cute sea turtle that loves to play pranks.
崕拥有神秘深海力量的神秘海龟: Mysterious sea turtle with mysterious deep-sea power.
崖爱哭的小蟹: Little crab that loves to cry.
崕我不想长大: I don't want to grow up.
崓能坐能战斗的实用小海豚: Practical little dolphin that can be ridden and fought with.
崑梦想飞行的帅气海豚: Handsome dolphin that dreams of flying.
崔异化出最强之盾的强大生物: Powerful creature that mutates into the strongest shield.
崔修行多年的树精: Treant that has cultivated for many years.
崔拥有最强大魔力的可爱萝莉: Cute loli with the most powerful magic.
崓攻防都不错的可爱穿山甲: Cute pangolin with good offense and defense.
崔拥有毁灭一切的可怕破坏力: Possesses terrifying destructive power that can destroy everything.
崔翱翔在蓝色天际的神之使者: Divine messenger soaring in the blue sky.
崓深不可测的九天玄女化身: Incarnation of the unfathomable Nine Heavens Mysterious Lady.
崒月色下孤傲的夜之王者: Proud king of the night under the moonlight.
崒海洋中最为危险的存在: The most dangerous existence in the ocean.
掌握该技能后捕获失败时敌人不会逃跑[捕获珍稀宠物必备]: Once this skill is learned, enemies won't flee when capture fails [essential for catching rare pets].
被动技能，在任意地形战斗都变为更利于植物系宠物的花园地形: Passive skill: turns any battlefield into the Garden terrain, favoring Plant-type pets.
被动技能，在任意地形战斗都变为更利于海洋系宠物的海面地形: Passive skill: turns any battlefield into the Sea Surface terrain, favoring Ocean-type pets.

被动技能，在任意地形战斗都变为更利于飞行系宠物的天空地形: Passive skill: turns any battlefield into the Sky terrain, favoring Flying-type pets.
被动技能，宠物忠诚度永不减少: Passive skill: pet loyalty will never decrease.
被动技能，延长野兽系宠物撕裂的持续回合: Passive skill: extends the duration of the Bleed effect for Beast-type pets.
被动技能，掌握该技能的宠物战斗后能获得三倍经验: Passive skill: pets with this skill gain triple experience after battle.
被动技能，掌握该技能的宠物战斗后能获得双倍经验: Passive skill: pets with this skill gain double experience after battle.
被动技能，提高金属系宠物的防御效果: Passive skill: enhances the defensive capabilities of Metal-type pets.
被动技能，有30%几率闪避受到的攻击: Passive skill: 30% chance to dodge incoming attacks.
被动技能，死亡后有70%的几率自动复活: Passive skill: 70% chance to automatically revive after being defeated.
被动技能，海洋系宠物攻击时可以减少能量消耗: Passive skill: Ocean-type pets consume less energy when attacking.
被动技能，逃跑一定成功: Passive skill: fleeing from battle always succeeds.
被动技能，飞行系宠物攻击时可同时减少对手能量: Passive skill: Flying-type pets reduce the opponent's energy when attacking.
